Governance

Anti-Lag Marketplace operates on a trust-first commerce model. Governance is not branding—it's the mechanism that protects buyers, partners, and the platform as we scale.

Policy-Driven Ops Vendor Verification Dispute Resolution Change Control Data Integrity

This page defines the operating standard. When we add features, the governance layer expands—never shrinks.

Core Controls

  • Partner onboarding: tiered verification for shops, brands, and sellers.
  • Listing integrity: standardized fitment fields + required evidence for claims.
  • Content moderation: removal standards for fraud, counterfeit, and unsafe guidance.
  • Change control: versioned updates to rules and templates (audit trail).
  • Security posture: least-privilege access and separation of public vs internal systems.

Disputes

Disputes are handled with structured intake, documented evidence, clear timelines, and consistent outcomes. The goal is repeatability—not improvisation.
